memberdef.name: bcast

detaileddescription.para: Broadcasts a message from the root rank to all other ranks

parameterdescription.para: The buffer which content is broadcasted
The number of elements of dtype in send_buf
The type of elements in the passed buffers
The rank of the broadcasting process, if the passed rank is negative, the default root rank is used

simplesect.para: The object to track the progress of the operation

The receiving buffer
The type of elements in send / recv

simplesect.para: The object to track the progress of the operation

memberdef.argsstring: (const byte_t *send_buf, std::int64_t send_count, byte_t *recv_buf, const std::int64_t *recv_counts, const std::int64_t *displs, const data_type &dtype) const
memberdef.name: allgatherv

detaileddescription.para: Collects data from all the ranks within a communicator into a single buffer and redistribute to all ranks. The data size send by each rank may be different.

parameterdescription.para: The send buffer
The number of elements of dtype in send_buf
The receiveing buffer, must contain at least rank_count * recv_count elements, significant only at root
The number of elements of dtype received from each rank, must contain at least rank_count elements, significant only at root
Entry $i$ specifies the displacement relative to recv_buf at which to place the incoming data from process $i$, must contain at least rank_count elements, significant only at root
The type of elements in the passed buffers

simplesect.para: The object to track the progress of the operation

memberdef.argsstring: (sycl::queue &queue, const byte_t *send_buf, std::int64_t send_count, byte_t *recv_buf, const std::int64_t *recv_counts, const std::int64_t *displs, const data_type &dtype, const std::vector< sycl::event > &deps={}) const
memberdef.name: allgatherv

memberdef.argsstring: (const D *send_buf, std::int64_t send_count, D *recv_buf, const std::int64_t *recv_counts, const std::int64_t *displs) const
